---
title: "Guideline for organizers of and contributors to mini symposia"
editor: 
  markdown: 
    wrap: 72
---

You are organizing a mini symposia for ISCB46 - many thanks for that! In this document we summarize answers to some common questions and further instructions. 

# Contributors

There is no need to upload your materials to conftool. Please send material to the organizer of your symposium.

# Organizers

The symposia will have to be run from a private laptop. We strongly encourage you to have all presentations ready before the event. 

Support for setting things up will be availabe in the room.

# FAQs

For more general questions please refer to the [FAQs](faq.html).
